name: Trail Breaking
description: Trail Breaking is a First-Person Adventure/Puzzle game set in multiple fantasy worlds. You unwillingly get drawn into an ancient magical portal to another realm. Solve puzzles and survive danger to find your way back home.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64-bit Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-2500k 3.3GHz Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 780 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 23 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64-bit Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7-7700k 4.0GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 1080 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 23 GB available space
